Class PingHeaderCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sabre.sws.des.soap.callback.PingHeaderCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeaderCallback, org.springframework.ws.client.core.WebServiceMessageCallback

    @Controller
public class PingHeaderCallback
extends java.lang.Object
implements HeaderCallback
    Class adding header for calls that refresh sessions.

        public void setWorkflowContext(com.sabre.sws.des.workflow.SharedContext workflowContext)
        Description copied from interface: HeaderCallback
        Sets the workflow context, so the conversationID set there for workflow can be used to get the correct session from the pool.
        Specified by:
        setWorkflowContext in interface HeaderCallback
        Parameters:
        workflowContext - the SharedContext for the workflow that calls the webservice where the callback should be used, containing the correct conversationID.
